title: Settings Override Template
description: Schema for GreenSwamp Alpaca alignment mode-specific override templates

Description.description: Human-readable description of this override template

AlignmentMode.description: Alignment mode this override applies to

Overrides.description: Settings that override common template values for this alignment mode

AtPark.description: Mount is at park position (persists across restarts)

CanSetPierSide.description: Mount can set pier side (false for AltAz, true for equatorial mounts that support pier flips)

HomeAxisX.description: Home position for X axis in degrees (mode-specific)

HomeAxisY.description: Home position for Y axis in degrees (mode-specific)

AutoHomeAxisX.description: Auto-home position for X axis in degrees (mode-specific)

AutoHomeAxisY.description: Auto-home position for Y axis in degrees (mode-specific)

ParkName.description: Name of the selected park position

ParkAxes.description: Park axes positions [X, Y] specific to this alignment mode

ParkPositions.description: Park positions specific to this alignment mode

HourAngleLimit.description: Hour angle limit in hours (typically 0 for AltAz)

AxisUpperLimitY.description: Upper limit for Y axis in degrees

AxisLowerLimitY.description: Lower limit for Y axis in degrees

AxisLimitX.description: Limit for X axis in degrees

PolarMode.description: Polar mode for fork mounts (Left) or GEM mounts (Right)

NoSyncPastMeridian.description: Prevent sync past meridian (typically true for GEM, false for AltAz)
